description: Sarah and Alex are sitting at a table, looking at a laptop together.
text:
Alex: This sounds great, Sarah. I think it has a lot of potential.
Sarah: Thanks, Alex. I'm really excited about it.

description: Sarah and Alex are shaking hands.
text:
Sarah: I'm glad you believe in this project, Alex.
Alex: I do. I think you're onto something big.

description: Sarah and Alex are at a meeting, presenting their business plan to a group of investors.
text:
Sarah: We believe this product will revolutionize the way people do business.
Investor: I'm impressed. I'd like to invest.

description: Sarah and Alex are celebrating their success at a party.
text:
Sarah: To our new business!
Alex: Cheers!

description: Sarah and Alex are standing in front of their new office, smiling.
text:
Alex: This is just the beginning.
Sarah: I know. I can't wait to see what the future holds.
